title: Cyberspace Soundtrack 100 Tracks
description: Cyberspace Soundtrack Music Pack is a high-quality pack of 100 tracks for royalty-free use in video games, created by Bobby Cole.
longDescription:
"Cyberspace Soundtrack" by Bobby Cole captures the essence of digital landscapes and futuristic adventures with 100 royalty-free tracks. Featuring pulsating beats and synthetic melodies, this album is ideal for setting the mood in games and projects that explore virtual worlds and high-tech scenarios.



Listen to my Cyberspace Soundtrack here: https://soundcloud.com/bobbycole/cyberspace-soundtrack-sampler


Once you've purchased this pack, feel free to contact me directly at hello@bobbycole.co.uk. I'm available to provide additional services such as track adjustments, consultation to select the best-suited tracks for your game, and custom music composition, all for an additional fee.


This Mega Pack includes 100 tracks:

  • 5 hours of music
  • 100 original high-quality tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license

Â 

Tracks details:

  • Audio sample rate: 44.1 kHz
  • Format: .wav
  • Bit depth: 16 bit
  • Loopable: No
technicalDetails:

  • Deception
  • Digital War
  • Epic Hybrid Orchestral Synths
  • Evocative Trailer Music
  • Modern Digital Orchestra
  • Warrior Robots
  • and many more!


Number of Audio Wavs: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5 hours 28 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes
